events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but would like to request a refund as it does not fit well and I am not satisfied with the quality.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to dissatisfaction; the case is classified under Refund.
Customer support agent Anna has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket purchase.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear the jacket didn’t meet your expectations. I’m here to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and let us know if the jacket has been used or if the tags are still attached to proceed with your refund request?
The order number is 123456789. The jacket was only tried on once at home, and all original tags are intact and still attached.
Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a full refund. Please ship the jacket back using the prepaid label we will email you shortly.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate the quick help and will send the jacket back as soon as I receive the label.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and to see if there is anything else we can help you with.
As you confirmed receiving the refund, we will now close this case. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day!
